tasks.label: install requirements
tasks.command: if (-Not (Test-Path .\env\Scripts\activate)) { python -m venv env; .\env\Scripts\activate; pip install -r requirements.txt } else { .\env\Scripts\activate; pip install -r requirements.txt }

windows.command: if (-Not (Test-Path .\env\Scripts\activate)) { python -m venv env; .\env\Scripts\activate; pip install -r requirements.txt } else { .\env\Scripts\activate; pip install -r requirements.txt }

tasks.label: migrations
tasks.command: if (Test-Path .\env\Scripts\activate) { .\env\Scripts\activate; python manage.py makemigrations; python manage.py migrate }

windows.command: if (Test-Path .\env\Scripts\activate) { .\env\Scripts\activate; python manage.py makemigrations; python manage.py migrate }

tasks.label: dumpdata
tasks.command: .\env\Scripts\activate; python -Xutf8 manage.py dumpdata auth.User --indent 2 > users/fixtures/UserData.json && python -Xutf8 manage.py dumpdata users.Profile --indent 2 > users/fixtures/ProfileData.json && python -Xutf8 manage.py dumpdata users.Address --indent 2 > users/fixtures/AddressData.json && python -Xutf8 manage.py dumpdata users.TalmzaLevel --indent 2 > users/fixtures/TalmzaLevelData.json && python -Xutf8 manage.py dumpdata users.SchoolLevel --indent 2 > users/fixtures/SchoolLevelData.json

windows.command: .\env\Scripts\activate; python -Xutf8 manage.py dumpdata auth.User --indent 2 > users/fixtures/UserData.json && python -Xutf8 manage.py dumpdata users.Profile --indent 2 > users/fixtures/ProfileData.json && python -Xutf8 manage.py dumpdata users.Address --indent 2 > users/fixtures/AddressData.json && python -Xutf8 manage.py dumpdata users.TalmzaLevel --indent 2 > users/fixtures/TalmzaLevelData.json && python -Xutf8 manage.py dumpdata users.SchoolLevel --indent 2 > users/fixtures/SchoolLevelData.json
